data.name: Comedy Dynamics: Coming to The Stage: Episode 2
data.short_description: This week, Dan Levy brings 2 comedians to the stage who both have some interesting facts about their names, Rhea Butcher & Eddie Della Siepe.  Intrigued? Tune in to hear their stories about growing up and airport security.  And, Humorous Vacuum Robot ponders his destiny.

fullgame.name: Comedy Dynamics: Coming to The Stage
